price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߕߋ߬ߟߋ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊߙߏ ߞߟߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߞߘߊߎ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߛߎ ߣߌ߫ ߕߟߋ߬ߘߐ߬ߟߊ ߝߣߊ߫ ߞߟߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
